description: The ENROLL_INFO_HX contains a history of changes to information pertaining to a patient's enrollment in a research study.

columns.name: ENROLL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient enrollment record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the ENROLL_INFO table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HX_MOD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
A history of status category number changes for the enrollment.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: HX_MOD_ALIAS
columns.description: A history of changes to patient's alias for the enrollment.

columns.name: HX_MOD_START_DT
columns.description: A history of start date changes for the enrollment.

columns.name: HX_MOD_END_DT
columns.description: A history of end date changes for the enrollment.

columns.name: HX_MOD_NOTE_CMT_CSN
columns.description: A history of the changes to the comments note record associated with the enrollment.

columns.name: HX_MOD_DTTM
columns.description: Instant that the enrollment information was modified.

columns.name: HX_MOD_USER_ID
columns.description: User who modified the enrollment information.

columns.name: HX_MOD_BRANCH_ID
columns.description: This item stores a history of the branches (arms) in a research study to which the patient has been assigned.

columns.name: HX_MYCHART_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
History of the enrollment's MyChart recruitment status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Waiting For Provider Approval


Provider Declined


Waiting for Patient Response


Patient Responded


Retracted
